info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 700 PM MDT... At 621 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tooele Army Depot, or near Grantsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Tooele Army Depot, Rush Valley and Erda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
